resources.string: This application was built in order to control the GoPiGo robot using Smart Contracts and IoT technologies. Click on the buttons to start moving it!

This application is part of a ISEC 2019 Fikalab project which is entitled \"Blockchain for IoT: An AI and Smart Contracts Approach\" whose creators are as follow: Carlos Ferreira, Luís Silvestre, Márcio Guia and Rodrigo Rafael.\n\nThis application was built in order to control the GoPiGo robot using Smart Contracts and IoT technologies. Click on the buttons to start moving it!
